org.streaminer.stream.cardinality

Class CountThenEstimate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.cardinality.CountThenEstimate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, ICardinality

    public class CountThenEstimate
extends Object
implements ICardinality, Externalizable
    Exact -> Estimator cardinality counting

    Avoids allocating a large block of memory for cardinality estimation until a specified "tipping point" cardinality is reached.

    Currently supports serialization with LinearCounting or AdaptiveCounting

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • merge

        public ICardinality merge(ICardinality... estimators)
                   throws CardinalityMergeException
        Description copied from interface: ICardinality
        Merges estimators to produce a new estimator for the combined streams of this estimator and those passed as arguments. Nor this estimator nor the one passed as parameters are modified.
        Specified by:
        merge in interface ICardinality
        Parameters:
        estimators - Zero or more compatible estimators
        Returns:
        The merged data structure
        Throws:
        CardinalityMergeException - If at least one of the estimators is not compatible with this one

      • mergeEstimators

        public static CountThenEstimate mergeEstimators(CountThenEstimate... estimators)
                                         throws CardinalityMergeException
        Merges estimators to produce an estimator for their combined streams
        Parameters:
        estimators -
        Returns:
        merged estimator or null if no estimators were provided
        Throws:
        CountThenEstimate.CountThenEstimateMergeException - if estimators are not mergeable (all must be CountThenEstimate made with the same builder)
